meanings.definition: (Slang, Internet) A deliberately misspelled version of the word "Naked".
meanings.english_definition: (Slang, Internet) A deliberately misspelled version of the word "Naked". Used to evade content filters.

examples.sentence: The site banned the word "naked", so users started posting "nake" pictures instead.
examples.translation: サイトは「裸」という言葉を禁止したので、ユーザーは代わりに「nake」の写真を投稿し始めました。

usage_notes.explanation: This word is used specifically to avoid content filters that block the word "naked". It is most commonly found in online contexts.
